segments.text: Hey , Ray , what are you doing right now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not much . Joann . Do you want to hang out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I do . I ’ m at home myself right now with nothing much to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me , too . What would you like to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we could go to a movie . Have you see Shrek 2 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have , actually . How about the movie , Million Dollar Baby with Clint Eastwood ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm ... I ’ Ve seen that , too . We could go for a walk in the park .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We could , but it looks like it ’ s going to rain soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess that ’ s out . Why don ’ t we go shopping ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d really rather not . I ’ ll be too tempted to buy something that I can ’ t afford !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . I guess we ’ d be not do that , either , then . What do you want to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t know . Do you want to go bowling at the new bowling alley on 1st street ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to , but I injured my wrist last weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s see . Do you want to go to a bar and sing some karaoke ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds interesting , but I can ’ t drink alcohol with the medicine I ’ m taking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Doesn ’ t sound like that ’ s be fun , then . Do you want to come here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t have a car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Goodness , we ’ re not having much luck here , are we ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . do you have a car ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but I could take the bus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , good . Why don ’ t you take the bus to mine and we could play Mah Tiang ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great ! Have you eaten ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not yet . I ’ ll cook dinner and have it ready by the time you get here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perfect . Are you prepared to give me all your money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Huh ? We are going to play for money , aren ’ t we ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , right . I suppose so . As long as you promise to lose !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey ... as long as I ’ m not alone on a Saturday night , I don ’ t really care what I do !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: See you soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bye !
segments.speaker: S1
